mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_book (isbn, title, price, publication_house, publication_date, introduction, type, recommend, `show`, inventory, sale_volume, img_url1, img_url2, img_url3, img_url4, img_url5) VALUES (#{isbn}, #{title}, #{price}, #{publicationHouse}, #{publicationDate}, #{introduction}, #{type}, #{recommend}, #{show}, #{inventory}, #{saleVolume}, #{imgUrl1}, #{imgUrl2}, #{imgUrl3}, #{imgUrl4}, #{imgUrl5})

SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS bookId
INSERT INTO tb_store_book VALUES (#{storeId}, #{bookId});
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_book SET price = #{price}, introduction = #{introduction}, type = #{type}, recommend = #{recommend}, `show` = #{show}, inventory = #{inventory} WHERE pk_id = #{pkId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_store_book WHERE store_id = #{storeId} AND book_id = #{bookId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_book WHERE pk_id IN (SELECT book_id FROM tb_store_book WHERE store_id = #{storeId})
SELECT * FROM tb_book WHERE recommend = 1 LIMIT #{limit}
